scenario_text.value:
You know, I should’ve thought of this sooner,
but how’s that old cable car working?

Where’s the power coming from? Who’s keeping
it running? It doesn’t make any sense!

It’s the same thing with the plumbing at the
school. Like, how does any of this work?

Who cares? All I want to know right now is
where Miu went. Come on, let’s go!
